song.title: Diamond in Your Soul
song.info:
(c) basehead / fm 1997
sonically, we're in control be the diamond in your soul
images come fast from the future from the past
vocals by Toni Halliday, all samples by me
from: fsol, william orbit, leftfield, korg ms20, roland jv880, and... single cell orchestra Good luck in '97 ...peace, love to jen
